name: Mouse IT
description:
MOUSE IT!

Mouse It is a game that is supposed to be a difficult game, that you have to take a crate to a button and head to the exit. And a little warning, beware with the walls.

This is just a prototype, if have bugs it's normal, just ignore ok?

If you like the prototype please consider rating c:

(64 BITS USES GLES3, IF YOUR PC DON'T HAVE SUPPORT  TO THIS SOFTWARE, TRY TO USE THE 32BITS)
